paper.title: Design of Financial Crisis Early Warning Model Based on PSO-SVM Algorithm
paper.abstract: To address the problem that the accuracy of the SVM algorithm is affected by random parameters at the input end, a financial crisis early warning model (FCEWM) based on PSO-SVM is constructed based on the nonequilibrium sample characteristics of different financial conditions of listed companies in China's gem. The model uses the PSO algorithm to optimize the parameters of SVM and selects 24 financial risk evaluation indexes as the input to predict the financial crisis. The results show that the proposed model is superior to other models in prediction accuracy and robustness.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是构建一个基于PSO-SVM算法的金融危机预警模型，用于预测上市公司的财务危机。这直接涉及金融风险管理领域，旨在通过优化算法提高财务风险预测的准确性和稳健性。
